article.title: AeroVironment Supports Raven Small Unmanned Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AeroVironment Incorporated, Monrovia, California, was awarded an $11,095,873 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the contractor logistics support in support of the Raven small unmanned aircraft system. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
